ourservices.title: Capabilities that assure industry-best eCommerce application development services
ourservices.subTitle: Our team of highly skilled eCommerce app developers have a varied background in software development, AI/ML, cloud computing, data and cybersecurity services. With this expertise, the team offers top-class eCommerce app development services, helping us become the best eCommerce app development company.

servicesList.title: Award-winning team
servicesList.description: As a premium eCommerce mobile app development company, our expertise is reflected in the digital products and apps developed by our eCommerce app developers that have bagged prestigious awards year-on-year.

servicesList.title: Best development practices
servicesList.description: Using DevOps and Agile methodologies, we quickly and efficiently cater to our client’s needs, closing gaps and delivering seamless shopping experiences.

servicesList.title: Transparency is paramount
servicesList.description: Being the best-in-class eCommerce app development company, we believe that an open communication channel translates into more productive and efficient eCommerce app development services. Therefore, we keep our clients updated about the development at all stages.

cardList.title: Deployment and maintenance
cardList.description: As part of our eCommerce software development services, we deploy the app or software on its intended platform and based on the feedback from focus groups and general users alike, we update and maintain the app for the best result.

clientReview.title: What Our Clients Have to Say For Our Services.

clients.name: John Doe
clients.review: We were looking for an agency that would understand the direness of the hourly worker job search cycle situation when we came across Appinventiv. What we liked about the team is how they did not just understand what we were looking for but also gave us ideas on how we could make the process more efficient and simplified for the jobseekers through their empathy mapping skillset.

clients.name: John Doe
clients.review: We approached Boxinall with a clear vision to build a robust and future-ready platform that could seamlessly integrate with the busy lifestyle of our customers while uplifting their overall experience and giving us a competitive edge. The Boxinall team not only understood our vision but also enhanced the overall solution with their expertise. The end results exceeded our expectations with massive improvements in the user base and digital revenue for different brands.

process.title: Our App Development Process
process.subTitle: Our design process follows a proven approach. We begin with a deep understanding of your needs and create a planning template.

processList.title: Define Your Idea
processList.description: Define the app's purpose, target audience, and goals. Conduct market research and competitor analysis. Create a detailed project plan, including milestones and timelines. Identify the app's key features and functionalities.

processList.title: Technical Requirement Gathering
processList.description: We send you a business proposal outlining cost estimates, scope of work and much more.

processList.title: Business proposal
processList.description: Define the app's purpose, target audience, and goals. Conduct market research and competitor analysis. Create a detailed project plan, including milestones and timelines. Identify the app's key features and functionalities.

processList.title: Find the best solution
processList.description: Well crafted proposal on how to reach your goals.

processList.title: We assign a dedicated Project Manager
processList.description: We assign a dedicated account manager to you.

processList.title: Assign a development team
processList.description: Well crafted proposal on how to reach your goals.

processList.title: Create scrum sheet for agile framework (JIRA)
processList.description: We assign a dedicated account manager to you.

processList.title: Start Your Project - Wireframing and Prototyping
processList.description: Create wireframes to visualize the app's structure and layout. Develop interactive prototypes for user testing and feedback.

processList.title: UI/UX Design
processList.description: Create a visually appealing and intuitive user interface (UI) design.  Develop a consistent and engaging user experience (UX). Design app icons, logos, and other branding elements.

processList.title: Development
processList.description: Select the appropriate technology stack (programming languages, frameworks, etc.). Implement the front-end and back-end functionalities. Integrate APIs and third-party services as needed. Conduct regular code reviews and testing during development.

processList.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
processList.description: Perform functional testing to ensure all features work as expected.  Conduct compatibility testing across different devices and operating systems.  Test the app's performance, security, and usability.  Address any identified bugs or issues..

processList.title: Deployment and Release
processList.description: Prepare the app for deployment to the desired app stores (e.g., Apple App Store, Google Play Store). Create developer accounts and fulfill submission requirements.  Generate release builds and upload the app for review.

featureSection.title: Our App Development Process
featureSection.subTitle: Our design process follows a proven approach. We begin with a deep understanding of your needs and create a planning template.

processList.title: Microservices-based eCommerce web and app development
processList.description: This involves the development of eCommerce web and app platforms using microservices architecture, allowing for scalability and flexibility.

processList.title: Backend, frontend, & CRM development
processList.description: This includes developing robust backend systems, responsive front-end interfaces, and integrated CRM systems for better customer management.

processList.title: Payment gateways
processList.description: Implementing secure and efficient payment gateways to handle transactions smoothly and securely.

processList.title: PWA eCommerce
processList.description: Progressive Web Apps (PWA) for eCommerce that provide an app-like experience on the web.
